categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems military bases

nodes.text: The Geonosian Command Center was a building on Geonosis from which Count Dooku, Archduke Poggle the Lesser, and Viceroy Nute Gunray monitored the ongoing First Battle of Geonosis in 22 BBY. It was equipped with a large circular holotable, and there was a hangar nearby.
